game.name: Rogue Empire: Dungeon Crawler RPG
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore randomly generated content and experience the thrill of a classic tactical turn-based rogue-like RPG! Choose from a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique abilities and strengths. Get ready for an unforgettable journey of strategy, skill, and discovery.
